name: @reproto/bs-rpc-axios
description: Reproto: Non-streaming RPC implementation with Axios
author: Balazs Ree <ree@greenfinity.hu>

scripts.protores:build: mkdir -p test/proto-res && yarn protores -v test/proto/*.proto -o test/proto-res/ProtoRpcAxios.res
scripts.protores:dev: mkdir -p test/proto-res && yarn protores -w -s -v test/proto/*.proto -o test/proto-res/ProtoRpcAxios.res
